trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Expone los tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> a la automatización de la interfaz de usuario.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> asociado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el nombre del control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> asociado a esta clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Pane" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: El valor de enumeración <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Pane" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el nombre del control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> asociado a esta clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "ScrollViewer".
trans-unit.target: Una cadena que contiene "ScrollViewer".

trans-unit.source: A value in the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Un valor de la enumeración.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el patrón de control para <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> asociado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, this method returns a <see langword="this" /> pointer; otherwise, this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Si el valor de <paramref name="patternInterface" /> es <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, este método devuelve un puntero <see langword="this" />; de lo contrario, devuelve <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" /> is understood by the end user as interactive or as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica si el usuario final entiende el objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> que está asociado a este objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" /> como interactivo o como contribuyente a la estructura lógica del control en la [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TemplatedParent" /> is <see langword="null" />, this method returns <see langword="true" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Si <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.TemplatedParent" /> es <see langword="null" />, este método devuelve <see langword="true" />; de lo contrario devuelve, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo o miembro es compatible con la infraestructura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] y no está pensado para ser usado directamente desde su código.

trans-unit.source: Value indicating whether control is can be scrolled in the horizontal direction.
trans-unit.target: Valor que indica si el control puede desplazarse horizontalmente.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo o miembro es compatible con la infraestructura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] y no está pensado para ser usado directamente desde su código.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal scroll position as a percentage of the total content area within the control.
trans-unit.target: Posición de desplazamiento horizontal como porcentaje del total del área de contenido del control.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo o miembro es compatible con la infraestructura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] y no está pensado para ser usado directamente desde su código.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="S_OK" /> if successful, or an error value otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve <see langword="S_OK" /> si la operación se realiza correctamente; de lo contrario, devuelve un valor de error.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal increment specific to the control.
trans-unit.target: Incremento horizontal específico del control.

trans-unit.source: The vertical increment specific to the control.
trans-unit.target: Incremento vertical específico del control.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo o miembro es compatible con la infraestructura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] y no está pensado para ser usado directamente desde su código.

trans-unit.source: Percent scrolled horizontally.
trans-unit.target: Porcentaje de desplazamiento horizontal.

trans-unit.source: Percent scrolled vertically.
trans-unit.target: Porcentaje de desplazamiento vertical.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo o miembro es compatible con la infraestructura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] y no está pensado para ser usado directamente desde su código.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo o miembro es compatible con la infraestructura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] y no está pensado para ser usado directamente desde su código.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control can scroll vertically; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si el control puede desplazarse verticalmente; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo o miembro es compatible con la infraestructura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] y no está pensado para ser usado directamente desde su código.

trans-unit.source: The vertical scroll position as a percentage of the total content area within the control.
trans-unit.target: Posición de desplazamiento vertical como porcentaje del total del área de contenido del control.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo o miembro es compatible con la infraestructura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] y no está pensado para ser usado directamente desde su código.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="S_OK" /> if successful, or an error value otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve <see langword="S_OK" /> si la operación se realiza correctamente; de lo contrario, devuelve un valor de error.
